code: import React from'react';function hexToRgb(hex,alpha){hex=hex.replace('#','');var r=parseInt(hex.length===3?hex.slice(0,1).repeat(2):hex.slice(0,2),16);var g=parseInt(hex.length===3?hex.slice(1,2).repeat(2):hex.slice(2,4),16);var b=parseInt(hex.length===3?hex.slice(2,3).repeat(2):hex.slice(4,6),16);if(alpha){return'rgba('+r+', '+g+', '+b+', '+alpha+')';}else{return'rgb('+r+', '+g+', '+b+')';}}var InfoCard=function InfoCard(_ref){var data=_ref.data;return React.createElement("div",{className:"jr-card net-chart"},React.createElement("div",{className:"jr-card-thumb",style:{backgroundColor:data.color,boxShadow:"0 6px 20px 0 ".concat(hexToRgb(data.color,0.19),",0 8px 17px 0 ").concat(hexToRgb(data.color,0.20))}},React.createElement("i",{className:"zmdi zmdi-".concat(data.icon)})),React.createElement("div",{className:"jr-card-body br-break"},React.createElement("h4",{className:"mb-0"},React.createElement("strong",null,data.title)),React.createElement("p",{className:"mb-0"},data.subTitle)));};export default InfoCard;InfoCard.defaultProps={styleName:''};
